          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Verb: Present Continuous 1</string>
            <string language="en">Verbs: Present Continuous 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verben: Anwesendes Ununterbrochenes 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verbes : 1 Continu Actuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verbos: 1 Contínuo Atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verbi: 1 Continuo Attuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρήματα: Παρόν συνεχές 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verbos: Actual 1 Continuo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you look at pictures and then try to find the right descriptions of what the people in the pictures are doing.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you look at pictures and then try to find the right description of what the people in the pictures åre doing. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="sv">present continuous</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">present continuous</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier versuchen Sie Blick auf Abbildungen und 
dann, zu finden die rechte Beschreibung von, was die Leute im 
Abbildungen åre Tun. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für 
Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici vous regard aux images et essayez alors de 
trouver la bonne description de ce qui les personnes dans faire des 
images åre. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants
- module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você olhar em retratos e tenta então 
encontrar a descrição direita de que os povos em fazer dos retratos 
åre. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui sguardo alle immagini ed allora provate a 
trovare la giusta descrizione di che cosa la gente nel fare delle 
immagini åre. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti 
- modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εξετάζετε τις εικόνες και προσπαθείτε έπειτα να 
βρείτε τη σωστή περιγραφή αυτών που οι άνθρωποι να κάνει 
εικόνων εre. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή 
ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted mirada en los cuadros y entonces 
intenta encontrar la descripción derecha de lo que la gente en hacer 
de los cuadros åre. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
